text:
Ah, I'm sorry...!
I am nervous, but...

I'm thinking about whether the feelings I convey through
the song will reach the people who listen to it...

─Maybe I should just go all out and let everyone feel
even this pounding in my chest...!

Oh...
Haha, that might be a good idea.

Hehe... Even though I can't figure it out,
somehow... I feel like I shouldn't lie.
Well then, here I go, Producer-san.
